commit message: Open Play Store app when extension is clicked and K-9 Mail is not installed
Remove code that is unnecessary because of minSdkVersion 17
Show error messages in settings screen

Display error message when we have no permission to access K-9 Mail

When the extension is installed before K-9 Mail it won't have the needed permissions to
access K-9 Mail's content provider. Reinstalling or updating the extension fixes this
problem.
Don't hide accounts without a name
